name: Please let me out
description:
To best experience the game, download the .exe file, the audio is bugged in the WebGL version and the FPS will be much higher on standalone version.

  • LControl - Sneak (Toggle)
  • LShift - Sprint
  • LAlt - Slow Walk
  • E - Interact with items

they took you against your will, they tortured you, took away your dignity and made you wear a very unfashionable jump suit but not anymore, now is the time to fight back join our intrepid hero on an exciting prison break where you'll have to look for tools, sneak around guards and find keys in the most unlikely of places so you can make your glorious prison break...break

Credits:

All colourful icons have been taken from flaticon.com

Voice acting provided by: @Leapblug4 (twitter) and @ameangelofsin (twitter)
